General.Name: Zephyr Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Zephyr Minerals Ltd., through its subsidiary, Zephyr Gold USA Ltd., engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties in Canada, Zimbabwe, and the United States. It explores for gold, silver, zinc, and lead deposits. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Halifax, Canada.
General.Address: Purdy's Wharf Tower 1, Halifax, NS, Canada, B3J 3N2
